name: APIS
description:
In APIS, you control a swarm of bees. Gather nectar, care for your brood, defend against attackers. Gather enough honey and you can bring forth the Imperatrix Apis, the Bee Empress.

Controls

  • Click on a flower to send a bee to harvest nectar.
  • Click on an enemy to send a bee to sting it.
  • First Button: Make new bee (4 nectar)
  • Second Button: Relocate hive (each bee can only carry one nectar, so surplus nectar will be discarded)
  • Third Button: Bring forth the Imperatrix Apis (100 nectar)

Team

  • Kathryn Criston (Music)
  • David Stark (Graphics, SFX)
  • Manuel Mumenthaler (Programming)
